name: color by number.
description:
Feeling stressed? Take just 5 minutes and start coloring. Rediscover the simple relaxation and joy of coloring.

• Color by numbers anywhere – no pencil, paper needed
• Creae your favorite themes: mandalas, animals, people, fantasy and many more
• Enjoy the simplicity and ease of the app use
• Paint colorful pictures, relax and feel positive emotions

Let your stress go away and color a few times a day.
